page.title: 02Industry around Choppington
page.content: The Industrial Site at Barrington contains a varied amount of Industry. There are four haulage contractors,two of these carrying an assortment of goods whilst the main haulage of the other two firms is coal. There is a concrete making plant, a metal works, coachworks and an Offshore Install- ation works. The only factory on the site to employ mostly women is Gemini Fashion Accessories which specialises in the manufacture of jeans. Welwyn Electrics is situated near Bedlington Station. It specialises in component parts for electronic equipment. Not far from the Welwyn there is a scrap merchant and a garage. At Bomarsund there is a plant hire depot where large plant machinery may be hired for excavation.
